author: coar
msg: Add a note about the continuation line feature; someone pointed
out that it isn't mentioned anywhere except the CHANGES file.
Submitted by:	Michael Long <mlong@questgate.net>

author: fielding
msg: ap_os_is_filename_valid() has been added to Win32
to detect and prevent access to special DOS device file names.
Submitted by:	Paul Sutton, Ken Parzygnat
Reviewed by:	Roy Fielding

author: fielding
msg: Created new makefiles Makefile_win32.txt (normal build)
and Makefile_win32_debug.txt (debug build) that work on Win95,
since nmake on Win95 doesn't like %variable% substitution.
These should work for NT as well, but I haven't tested on NT.
